name: DJ Master (itch)
description:
A Hard Rhythm music videogame, with simple controls !

Goal : Press the correct piano key in rhythm with the music, to crush the notes when it reaches the glow line. Don't crush the spiny mines !

***Using Keyboard :

->left/right arrows : left, right piano key

->up/down arrows : center piano key

-> Spacebar to press all piano keys at once.

***Using Standard Controller :

->same as keyboard, using arrow hat pad, and A/B button to press all piano keys at once.

Game made using Godot Engine.

Vedg launcher (windows) by Noiros (https://noiros.itch.io/)
